Summary: Biochemical reaction from n-desmethyltoremifene to 4-hydroxy-n-desmethyltoremifene. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2D6 or CYP2C9.
Biochemical reaction from toremifene to 4-hydroxytoremifene. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP2C19, CYP2D6, CYP2B6 or CYP2C9.
Biochemical reaction from toremifene to n-desmethyltoremifene. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A5, CYP3A4 or CYP2D6.
Biochemical reaction from 4-hydroxytoremifene to 4-hydroxy-n-desmethyltoremifene. This interaction can be catalyzed by CYP3A5, CYP3A4 or CYP2D6.
